testimonials.name: John Doe
testimonials.text: Use this as an opportunity to promote what it is like to work with you. High value testimonials include ones from current or past co-workers, managers, or from happy clients.

testimonials.name: Jane Doe
testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. Encourage them to be specific and include important details (notes about a project you were on together, impressive quality produced, etc).

testimonials.name: Someone else
testimonials.text: Add several of these, and keep them as fresh as possible, but be sure to focus on quality testimonials with strong highlights of your skills/work ethic.
